mapper.select: select nb.seat_no, seat_status, user_id, reg_time, return_time from notebook_room nb left join notebook_room_rental nbr on nb.seat_no = nbr.seat_no where nb.seat_no order by nb.seat_no
mapper.insert: insert into notebook_room_rental values(#{seat_no}, #{user_id}, null, date_add(current_timestamp, INTERVAL 3 HOUR))
